query:
SELECT c.id, c.name, c.slug, COUNT(g.id) as total_goals
FROM campaigns c
LEFT JOIN teams t ON t.campaignId = c.id
LEFT JOIN players p ON p.teamId = t.id
LEFT JOIN goals g ON g.playerId = p.id
GROUP BY c.id, c.name, c.slug
HAVING total_goals > 0
ORDER BY total_goals DESC;

LEFT JOIN players p ON p.teamId = t.id
LEFT JOIN goals g ON g.playerId = p.id
GROUP BY c.id, c.name, c.slug
HAVING total_goals > 0
